sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { CommonModule } from "@angular/common"; import { FormsModule } from "@angular/forms"; import { Router } from "@angular/router"; import { trigger, state, style, transition, animate, } from "@angular/animations"; import { SocialIconsComponent } from "../../shared/social-icons/social-icons.component"; @Component({ selector: "app-login", standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, FormsModule, SocialIconsComponent], templateUrl: "./login.component.html", styleUrls: ["./login.component.css"], animations: [ trigger("pageTransition", [ transition(":enter", [ style({ opacity: 0, transform: "translateX(-100%)" }), animate( "600ms ease-out", style({ opacity: 1, transform: "translateX(0%)" }) ), ]), transition(":leave", [ animate( "600ms ease-in", style({ opacity: 0, transform: "translateX(100%)" }) ), ]), ]), ], }) export class LoginComponent { // Login method toggle loginMethod: "email" | "phone" = "email"; // Phone sub-method toggle phoneMethod: "password" | "otp" = "password"; // Email/Password fields email: string = ""; password: string = ""; // Phone fields phone: string = ""; phonePassword: string = ""; // OTP fields otp: string = ""; otpSent: boolean = false; showOtpInputs: boolean = false; constructor(private router: Router) {} onSubmit() { if (this.loginMethod === "email") { console.log("Email login submitted:", { email: this.email, password: this.password, }); } else if (this.phoneMethod === "password") { console.log("Phone + Password login submitted:", { phone: this.phone, password: this.phonePassword, }); } else { if (!this.otpSent) { this.sendOTP(); } else { this.verifyOTP(); } } } sendOTP() { console.log("Sending OTP to:", this.phone); // Simulate OTP sending this.otpSent = true; } verifyOTP() { console.log("Verifying OTP:", this.otp); // Navigate to OTP verification page this.router.navigate(["/otp-verify"], { queryParams: { phone: this.phone }, }); } toggleLoginMethod() { this.loginMethod = this.loginMethod === "email" ? "phone" : "email"; // Reset form fields when switching this.email = ""; this.password = ""; this.phone = ""; this.phonePassword = ""; this.otp = ""; this.otpSent = false; this.showOtpInputs = false; } setPhoneMethod(method: "password" | "otp") { this.phoneMethod = method; // Reset phone-related fields when switching this.phone = ""; this.phonePassword = ""; this.otp = ""; this.otpSent = false; this.showOtpInputs = false; } onPhoneEnter() { if (this.phoneMethod === "otp" && this.phone.trim()) { this.showOtpInputs = true; // Auto-focus on first OTP input after animation setTimeout(() => { const firstOtpInput = document.querySelector('input[name="otp"]') as HTMLInputElement; if (firstOtpInput) { firstOtpInput.focus(); } }, 300); } } navigateToRegister() { this.router.navigate(["/register"]); } }
